thread.title: Manchester bar Satan's Hollow to throw massive Star Wars-themed gig and party on Friday night - Manchester Evening News
thread.title_full: Manchester bar Satan's Hollow to throw massive Star Wars-themed gig and party on Friday night - Manchester Evening News

author: Simon Binns
title: Manchester bar Satan's Hollow to throw massive Star Wars-themed gig and party on Friday night - Manchester Evening News
text:
Get What's On updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Manchester bar Saran's Hollow is throwing a huge Star Wars-themed gig and club night for Jedis - and rebels - this weekend, including fancy dress, prizes and the maddest band this side of the Cantina Bar. 
To celebrate the announcement of the new Star Wars film The Last Jedi, the venue is putting on a gig by 'the worlds only Star Wars themed metal band' on the same night. 
Galactic Empire - which consists of lead guitarist Dark Vader, drummer Boba Sett, bassist Bass Commander (a Storm Trooper) and two more guitarists named Shadow Ranger and Red Guard, will perform music from the Star Wars soundtrack 'with an added metal twist'. 
Check out the video above to see them in action. Read More Review: Green Day at Manchester Arena 
After the gig, it becomes a club night that last until 3.30am, with load of Star Wars goodies up for grabs - especially for the best fancy dress. Entry to the club night - which happens this Friday - is free for anyone with a ticket to the gig. Doors open at 6.30pm and tickets are available to buy from www.seetickets.com . Read More
